body: I always enjoy what you post regardless of weather or not you wrote it but I think lolicon wiz probably enjoys your original content more. Although when push comes to shove an entertaining comment is an entertaining comment so he problely shouldn't be so picky.

Most of the stories and stuff I post here are written by me but sometimes I put some interesting stories that I come across in my travels around the internet and share them here, but I always make sure that what I post is high quality content. And yeah, aluminium isn't very poggers
Btw you should have a crack at writing copy pastas from scratch it's good shit, I think Being the creator of them instead of the re poster is the true sigma male path 👌

@Kirby Cosmico's Stories aluminium leavs nasty shit on your hands when you've been working with it and aluminum is bad if it's residue gets into your body so I agree and I would of punched the faggot too. My fave metal is probs high carbon steel.

I was walking home today and some fucker bumped into me and instantly started talking shit about aluminium being the best metal. I calmly tried to explain to him that iron was actually the best metal, but he wouldn't take a hint. He started throwing words around like "rust" and I lost it. Punched him right in his aluminium loving fuckface. I hate aluminium so god damn much. Stupid fucking element! (Fuck this doujin too!)
Looking for hentai, he clicks something promising, but finds something gay.
Well, normal dark sites diving i guess.
Not sure this actually IS Netorare. The first guy doesn’t seem all that concerned or even saddened. In fact it kinda looks like he planned this.
Fucking slut should've drowned from her own stupidity along with the mc.
This is ntr, he got her first. Those guys should've died for fuck sake, fucking cunts ruining the fucking story.
